title: Windows 11 build 22000.593 is now available with changes to notifications
content:
We’re a couple of weeks away from the next Patch Tuesday, but today, Microsoft is rolling out a new optional update for Windows 11. This update brings the build number to version 22000.593, and it includes all the changes that were rolled out to Insiders a couple of weeks ago with Windows 11 build 22000.588.

The post Windows 11 build 22000.593 is now available with changes to notifications appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft is rolling out Windows 11 build 22000.593 as an optional update for everyone, including the ability to display more notifications.
